-- input --
Text.

  1. One
  999999999999999999999. Big
  1000000000000000000000. Bigger
  1000000000000000000001. Biggest

-- gofmt --
Text.

 1. One
 999999999999999999999. Big
 1000000000000000000000. Bigger
 1000000000000000000001. Biggest

-- text --
Text.

 1. One
 999999999999999999999. Big
 1000000000000000000000. Bigger
 1000000000000000000001. Biggest

-- markdown --
Text.

 1. One
 999999999999999999999. Big
 1000000000000000000000. Bigger
 1000000000000000000001. Biggest
